animeTitle: Mini Toji: Kanami-Mihono no "Toji Miko Taidou-hen" 205-byou de Shoukai Tokuban!
animeDescription: Episode 0 of Mini Toji. Kanami and Mihono are self-aware that they are in an anime and introduce/recap the Toji no Miko story so that viewers can enjoy Mini Toji the following week even if they haven't watched the original.
